lines: Ser Aymeric has told me much and more about you. Suffice it to say my expectations are high.
A great many of our ballistas are beyond repair. They will be sorely missed when the beating of leathern wings fills the skies above Ishgard.
The dragoons are chronically undermanned, and more so now than ever before. We must needs rectify the situation, and soon, else we shall struggle to match our foes in the sky.
The heretics wreaked the greatest havoc in Foundation. In war, it is inevitably the weak and powerless who are made to suffer most of all...
Though you are no daughterson of Ishgard, you have shed blood with us and for us. Though I am no individual of any great import, I would express my gratitude all the same. Thank you, my friend.
The first commander─and you─have been entrusted with a mission of grave import. For Ishgard's sake, it must not fail.
We received word from the first commander not long ago. Though I would have preferred a swifter resolution, I am relieved to hear that our invitation is receiving due consideration.
The lord commander of the Temple Knights, assaulted in the streets! What madness has gripped our fair city...
Words cannot well express our gratitude, Forename. Thank you for rescuing the hostages...and for keeping the lord commander safe.
The first commander is tending to the preparations at Falcon's Nest. If all goes to plan, this will mark a new day for Ishgard!
We must have the strength to stand unwavering in the face of the enemy. 'Tis the only way we will weather this storm and deliver our people into a new era.
We are redeploying the city's defenses in anticipation of the coming attack. The High Houses have placed their forces at our command, and together we shall form a wall of impervious steel!
Though our principal foe lies defeated, we shall continue to keep order inside the walls and protect the citizenry. In that much at least, the duties of the Temple Knights remain unchanged.

Ser Hildeth has apprised me of the situation. Impressive work at Bahrr Lehs. You fell the evil Nidhogg, and then raise a monument to friendship and peace. We are truly blessed to have you on our side.
The greater part of the Temple Knights have been dispatched to hold the Ala Mhigan border. Though only few remain here in Ishgard, I assure you our people yet remain in good hands.

obj.n: イシュガルド代表使節団
グリダニアンプライベート・ソード
ヘヴンスナイト・アーマー
ヘヴンスナイト・ガントレット
ヘヴンスナイト・トラウザー
ヘヴンスナイト・サバトン
